column5: Hey all, Just thought I would share a photo of my 2017 opening day musky and introduce myself. I have been a member of the forum for a few years but am just getting into posting and sharing. My dad, a.k.a rattletrap 2, has been on here for years and now that I am such an avid outdoors woman with a thirst for knowledge he said this is a place I might like to spend some time.  I fish regularly, for any fish but have a real passion for slaying musky these days. I am also a novice bow hunter, looking to get more into it this coming fall.  A big thanks to Mike over at handlebarz lures, and his double 8s in a custom colour from the muskey oddesey I was able to bring this beauty bruiser aboard within the first half hour of my opening day up in the kawarthas.  I look forward to sharing and learning from and with you all.
Welcome to the board! That's a great way to kick off your season! Nice fish.
:good:awesome way to have an intro....and with a great fishing report....
Nice fish Welcome aboard Any Kid  of rattletrap 2 has to be ok. Lol
Beauty! Nice fish too!  S.
Welcome aboard Miss and a very nice Ski!
LOL Terry, It's his daughter!
good to see another lady killin it in the game.  welcome
Awesome start.  Mine starts in just under a couple weeks on Nipissing.

Thanks for the warm welcome, and yes I am in fact his DAUGHTER lol, closest one he has to a son. He doesn't seem to mind having me for a fishing buddy especially these days when we can swap tips, tricks and share spots
Nice intro and Ski, for sure. Maybe you could give some beauty tips to the old guy.
Looks like MR.B, has passed on the great sport of fishing. Great job dad.   Welcome to the forum.
Welcome, welcome.  Sweet Fish!  Interesting voices are always welcome.  Cheers,  Mark
Nice ski! Was a tough weekend by all accounts so im sure it felt great to get an early one. Congrats on winning the handlebarz hoorag too!
Welcome! nice ski, dad's make good net men!
Right on. Nice fish and welcome to the board
Nice catch, welcome to OFC
Nice ski, and welcome aboard!
Nice opener, and that fish looks like it sports some girth for early season, welcome
No shortage of ski fishers here. You'll fit in fine. Welcome aboard.
Great catch! Had some luck on PIgeon last week, and one of my lures of choice was a handlebarz double 8. Welcome aboard!
great fish!  Nice intro!  Cheers
